title: The Full bell curve
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions

description: When Paula Pippin and her husband told their friends they were moving to the country, the responses ranged from suspicion to outright hostility. But the Pippin family were on an adventure which would introduce them to the full bell curve of society.
